data.title: Our Residents
data.meta_description: A list of the house staff for the Dartmouth Hitchcock Medical Center General Surgery Residency program
data.text:
Emily Beck, MD

Medical school: Western Michigan University Homer Stryker MD School of Medicine

Hobbies: Hiking, gardening, horseback riding, watching movies, cooking, and playing with my cats Millie and Maisie.

Daniel Habbal, MD

Medical school: Sidney Kimmel Medical College at Thomas Jefferson University

Hobbies: Guitar, rugby, reading, any outdoor activity and sport, and hanging out with my cat Peach.

Noelle Polakowski, MD

Medical school: Michigan State University College of Human Medicine

Hobbies: Spending time with my family, practicing yoga and being outdoors - running, skiing, golfing, and adventuring with my golden retriever, Ody.

Malini Riddle, MD

Medical school: Foster SOM, Texas Tech University Health Sciences Center El Paso

Hobbies: All things animals, hiking, snorkeling, reading, painting, sewing, music and baking bread (but mostly eating it).

Kevin Sanchez, MD

Medical School: Universidad Adventista del Plata (Entre Rios, Argentina)

Hobbies: Traveling, hiking, snowboarding, laughing with family and friends and being a dog dad

Joseph (Joey) Miller, MD

Medical School: East Tennessee State University, Quillen COM

Hobbies: Football, Sports, Weightlifting, Surfing, Traveling, Spending time with my kids, and taste testing breweries

Keely Reidelberger, MD

Medical School: University of Nebraska Medical Center

Hobbies: All things art, exploring the outdoors with my dog, card games/board games/videogames

Allyse Zondlak, MD

Medical School: University of Michigan Medical School

Hobbies: Hiking, exercising, soccer, sleeping, hanging out with friends and family, DIY-ing my house

Ming Cai, MD

Medical School: Perelman School of Medicine at the University of Pennsylvania

Hobbies: Knitting, drawing, painting, reading for fun, playing music, hiking and spending time outside with our dog Merlin

Mahmoud Shehada, MD

Medical School: Royal College of Surgeons in Ireland-Bahrain

Hobbies: Traveling, horse riding, hiking, spending time with family

Michael Akodu

Medical School: University of Ibadan College of Medicine

Hobbies: Watching soccer (Arsenal FC fan here), exploring museums and art galleries, reading novels, watching sci-fi movies

Haya Alshaabi, MD

Medical School: Geisel School of Medicine at Dartmouth

Hobbies: Writing, drawing, cooking, spending time with friends and family.

Canaan Hancock, MD

Medical School: Dell Medical School at the University of Texas at Austin

Hobbies: Gardening, reading history or fantasy books, card/board games, playing/watching sports (especially football, basketball, and soccer), backpacking, and spending time with my wife and dogs.

Margaret (Maggie) Min, MD

Medical School: Duke University School of Medicine

Hobbies: Camping with my cats Shrimp and Oyster, climbing, knitting, gardening, fostering animals

Benjamin (Ben) Potee, MD

Medical School: University of Massachusetts T.H. Chan School of Medicine

Hobbies: Running, hiking, biking, sourdough baking, and being forever hopeful about Boston sports.

Georgios Skandalakis, MD

Medical School: University of Athens School of Health Sciences

Hobbies: Spending time with family and friends, running, hiking, swimming, and reading

Jarl Thysell, DO

Medical School: Pacific Northwest University of Health Sciences (PNWU)

Hobbies: Soccer, rowing (RowErg), running, any FromSoftware video game, and taking my dogs on hikes!

Emery Boudreau, MD

Medical School: University of Utah School of Medicine

Hobbies: Drawing, getting outside (snowboarding, running, hiking), trying new local beers, spending time with family and friends
